Nos services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Approche holistique de la gestion de patrimoine

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||60px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”93345947-f191-46db-8752-0103e26d6920″ text_orientation=”justified” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Notre approche holistique de la gestion de patrimoine implique une stratégie financière globale pour améliorer votre portefeuille. Chez Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée, nos services de conseil financier sont conçus pour vous aider à prendre le contrôle de votre patrimoine et de sa répartition, tout en vous aidant à planifier votre avenir financier dans les domaines clés suivants :

custom_margin=”30px||10px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|30px|0px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Offre pour les clients privés

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”1px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée est un leader du secteur lorsqu’il s’agit de fournir à ses clients une gamme inégalée de services spécialisés. Aller au-delà des attentes de notre clientèle privilégiée fait partie de la philosophie du Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée et nos clients profitent de cette expérience améliorée dans chacun des services pour lesquels nous sommes réputés.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#advice” button_text=”Read More” button_alignment=”left” module_class=”simple-text-button divioverlay-899″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ header_2_font_size=”16px” header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” background_enable_color=”off” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”30px||10px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|30px|0px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Bureau de gestion familiale (family office)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”1px|30px|30px|30px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Chez Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée, nous sommes fiers d’offrir un conseil consultatif interne qui fournit une approche cohérente et complète pour répondre à vos besoins en matière d’investissement. Nous le faisons par l’intermédiaire de notre Bureau de gestion familiale Rosen Group Family Office, qui utilise un processus formel, inclusif et transparent par lequel une équipe collaborative de conseillers financiers travaille ensemble pour faire fructifier votre portefeuille.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#advice” button_text=”Read More” button_alignment=”left” module_class=”simple-text-button divioverlay-907″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”237bc5d5-577e-4325-8acc-1d0169a83132″ positioning=”absolute” position_origin_a=”bottom_left” vertical_offset=”30px” horizontal_offset=”30px” z_index=”2″ horizontal_offset_tablet=”60px” horizontal_offset_phone=”” horizontal_offset_last_edited=”on|tablet” position_origin_a_tablet=”bottom_center” position_origin_a_phone=”” position_origin_a_last_edited=”on|desktop” position_origin_f_tablet=”” position_origin_f_phone=”” position_origin_f_last_edited=”on|tablet” position_origin_r_tablet=”” position_origin_r_phone=”” position_origin_r_last_edited=”on|tablet” positioning_tablet=”” positioning_phone=”” positioning_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||60px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”93345947-f191-46db-8752-0103e26d6920″ text_orientation=”justified” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Notre approche holistique de la gestion de patrimoine implique une stratégie financière globale pour améliorer votre portefeuille. Chez Groupe Rosen gestion privée de patrimoine Ltée, nos services de conseil financier sont conçus pour vous aider à prendre le contrôle de votre patrimoine et de sa répartition, tout en vous aidant à planifier votre avenir financier dans les domaines clés suivants :

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Tax des investissements

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As your wealth grows, your income tax situation becomes more complex. Rosen Group Private Wealth Management’s wealth managers do not prepare your tax return, but we will give it a thorough examination in order to ensure that you are minimizing your tax burden.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Retirement des investissements

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Rosen Group Private Wealth Management’s wealth managers are fully prepared to help you tailor a retirement plan that suits your distinct needs. We assist clients at every stage of retirement and distribution planning, with an emphasis on building client wealth and effectively guiding wealth distribution during your retirement years.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Estate des investissements

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Estate planning is crucial for both you and your family. It not only allows you to avoid unnecessary taxes, court costs, and attorney fees, but it also removes the burden of organizing your estate from the shoulders of your loved ones.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Formation Savings Plan

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

College tuition rates have never been higher. Saving for your children’s college costs can be overwhelming to think about let alone manage. With our financial advisory services, we’ll help you put together a plan to start saving for college now, so that you will be well prepared when the big day finally arrives.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Insurance Strategies

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Even the grandest of plans can go awry. A well-designed insurance plan helps ensure that you are protecting your assets without purchasing more insurance than you need. Insurance is a two-fold advantage in that it also provides something intangible yet priceless: peace of mind for you and your family.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cta-footer-background-paralax_2.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”90px||90px||false|false” global_module=”868″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-center” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_typing_effect before_typing_effect=”Invest in” typing_effect=”yourself.|your future.” typing_speed=”50ms” typing_backdelay=”3000ms” typing_cursor=”| ” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”48px” header_font_size_phone=”34px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_typing_effect][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#AC9869″ header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”||||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Contact us today

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjM4OCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”df9c7a6a-ffe3-4d5f-9c80-8d55d8fb5bf6″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Our ServicesHolistic Approach to Wealth ManagementOur holistic approach to wealth management entails an all-encompassing financial strategy for enhancing your portfolio. At Rosen Group Private Wealth Management, our financial advisory services are designed to help you take control of your wealth, and wealth distribution, while helping to map out your financial future in these key areas:Private Client OfferingRosen Group Private Wealth Management is an industry leader when it comes to providing our clients with an unparalleled array of niche services. Going above and beyond for our select clientele is a part of Rosen Group Private Wealth Management’s philosophy and our clients enjoy this enhanced experience in each and every service we are known for.Family Office OfferingAt Rosen Group Private Wealth Management, we pride ourselves on offering an in-house Advisory Board which provides a cohesive, comprehensive approach to your investment needs. We do this via our Rosen Group Family Office, which utilizes a formal, inclusive, and transparent process through which a collaborative team of financial advisors work together to grow your portfolio.Our holistic approach to wealth management entails an all-encompassing financial strategy for enhancing your portfolio. At Rosen Group Private Wealth Management, our financial advisory services are designed to help you take […]
